## K nearest neighbour (using normal data)
#### Split data (70-30)
```{r}

set.seed(17245)
sample_data <- createDataPartition(sampled_normal$Accident_Severity, list=F, p=0.7) 
train_sample_normal <- sampled_normal[sample_data, ]
test_sample_normal <- sampled_normal[-sample_data, ]
```

#### Get accuracy Baseline
```{r}

accuracybasline <- round(length(test_sample_normal[test_sample_normal$Accident_Severity == 'Slight', ]$Accident_Severity)/length(test_sample_normal$Accident_Severity), 3)
accuracybasline
```

### Training the Model
```{r}
Start_time <- Sys.time()
knn_Fit <- train(Accident_Severity~., data=train_sample_normal, tuneGrid=expand.grid(k=25:50), metric="Accuracy",
                method="knn",
                trControl=trainControl(number=10, method="cv"))
End_time <- Sys.time()
knn_Runtime <- round(as.numeric(End_time - Start_time), 2)
plot(knn_Fit)

```

### Testing the Model
```{r}

test_sample_normal$Accident_Severity = as.factor(test_sample_normal$Accident_Severity)

test_sample_normal$Predict <- predict(knn_Fit, test_sample_normal)
knn_confusion_mtx <- confusionMatrix(data=test_sample_normal$Predict, reference=test_sample_normal$Accident_Severity)
test_sample_normal <- test_sample_normal %>%
  mutate(Predict = predict(knn_Fit, test_sample_normal),
         Predict_prob = predict(knn_Fit, type="prob", test_sample_normal)[,2],
         error = ifelse(Predict != Accident_Severity, 1, 0))

# ROC
roc <- test_sample_normal %>%
  select(Predict_prob, Accident_Severity) %>%
  mutate(Accident_Severity = as.numeric(Accident_Severity) - 1,
         Accident_Severity.str = c("Fatal_Serious", "Slight")[Accident_Severity + 1]) %>%
  ggplot(aes(d = Accident_Severity, m = Predict_prob)) +
  geom_roc(labels = F)
roc +
  style_roc(theme = theme_bw, xlab = "False Positive Rate", ylab = "True Positive Rate") +
  theme(panel.grid.major = element_blank(), panel.border = element_blank(),
        axis.line = element_line(colour = "black")) +
  ggtitle("kNN - ROC Curve") +
  annotate("text", x = .75, y = .25,
           label = paste("AuROC=", round(calc_auc(roc)$AUC, 3)))

```

### Model Evaluation
```{r}
knn_accuracy <- round(knn_confusion_mtx$overall['Accuracy'], 3)
knn_recall <- round(knn_confusion_mtx$byClass['Sensitivity'], 3)
knn_precision <- round(knn_confusion_mtx$byClass['Pos Pred Value'], 3)
knn_f1_score <- round(2*((knn_precision * knn_recall) / (knn_precision + knn_recall)), 3)
knn_roc <- round(calc_auc(roc)$AUC, 3)
test_sample_normal <- test_sample_normal[ , !(names(test_sample_normal) %in% c('Predict', 'Predict_prob', 'error'))]
data.frame(accuracybasline, knn_accuracy, knn_recall, knn_precision, knn_f1_score, knn_roc)
```
